name: ants-nipype
label: ANTS using nipype
description: A test gear to evaluate nipype functionality
author: Loki, the trickster god
maintainer: the monster that lives under my bed

t1w-input.description: T1 weighted anatomical NIfTI file. When provided this file will be used in place of any T1w images found in the current session.

has-skull.description: Does the T1 have a skull present? [ default = true ]
